resources.string:
Bahrainona,
 Maleekona,
 Ramzul weaam, Dostoroha aali almakanati wal maqam;
 Meethaqoha nahju ashareeati wal oroobati wal qeyam,
 Aashat mamlakatul bahrain,
 Baladol keram,
 Mahdo salaam,
 Dostoroha aali almakanati wal maqam,
 Meethaqoha nahju ashareeati wal oroobati wal qeyam,
 Ashat mamlakatol Bahrain!
